CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( FOB_Additional_Contract__r.Status__c, 'Forward Contract Sell'), ( FOB_Additional_Contract__r.Spot_Rate_Sell_Execute__c - Forward_FOB_Contract__r.Contract_Rate__c ) * Cover_Amount_Foreign__c , 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ( Spot Rate - Contract Rate ) * Cover Amount
CustomField.label: Hedging Gain/Loss
